hypothesis: Tony Bill worked with an actor.
premise: + Tony Bill + As an actor , Bill has had supporting roles in films including Come Blow Your Horn ( 1963 ) , Shampoo ( 1975 ) , Pee-Wee 's Big Adventure ( 1985 ) , and Less Than Zero ( 1987 ) . + Tony Bill + He produced the 1973 movie The Sting , for which he shared the Academy Award for Best Picture with Michael Phillips and Julia Phillips . + Tony Bill + He made his directorial debut with My Bodyguard ( 1980 ) , and has since directed movies like Six Weeks ( 1982 ) , Five Corners ( 1987 ) , Crazy People ( 1990 ) , and Flyboys ( 2006 ) . + My Bodyguard + The film stars Chris Makepeace , Adam Baldwin , Matt Dillon , Martin Mull , and Ruth Gordon . + Dudley Moore + Dudley Stuart John Moore , CBE (  19 April 193527 March 2002 ) was an English actor , comedian , musician and composer .
explanation_1: Tony Bill worked with Dudley Moore.

hypothesis: Gwen Stefani's band released an album in 1995.

Brooks . + Helen Hunt + Some of her other notable films include Twister ( 1996 ) , Cast Away ( 2000 ) , What Women Want ( 2000 ) , Pay It Forward ( 2000 ) , and The Sessions ( 2012 ) , the latter garnered her a second Academy Award nomination . + Helen Hunt + Helen Elizabeth Hunt ( born June 15 , 1963 ) is an American actress , director , and screenwriter . + Cast Away + Cast Away is a 2000 American epic survival drama film directed and produced by Robert Zemeckis and starring Tom Hanks , Helen Hunt , and Nick Searcy .

hypothesis: Jonathan Hensleigh directed a film starring John Travolta.
premise: + The Punisher (2004 film) + The Punisher is a 2004 American vigilante action film based on the Marvel Comics character of the same name , starring Thomas Jane as the antihero Frank Castle/The Punisher and John Travolta as Howard Saint , a money launderer who orders the death of Castle 's entire family . + Jonathan Hensleigh + Jonathan Blair Hensleigh ( born February 1959 ) is an American screenwriter and film director , working primarily in the action-adventure genre , best known for writing film such as Jumanji , Die Hard with a Vengeance , and Armageddon , as well as making his own directorial debut with the 2004 comic book action film The Punisher . + Die Hard with a Vengeance + It was co-produced and directed by John McTiernan ( who directed Die Hard ) , written by Jonathan Hensleigh , and stars Bruce Willis as New York City Police Department Lieutenant John McClane , Samuel L. Jackson as McClane 's reluctant partner Zeus Carver , and Jeremy Irons as Simon Peter Gruber . + Swordfish (film) + Swordfish is a 2001 American action crime thriller film directed by Dominic Sena and starring John Travolta , Hugh Jackman , Halle Berry , Don Cheadle and Vinnie Jones . + Wild Hogs + Wild Hogs '' ' is a 2007 American biker comedy road film directed by Walt Becker and starring Tim Allen , John Travolta , Martin Lawrence and William H. Macy .
explanation_1: Jonathan Hensleigh directed the film The Punisher, which starred John Travolta.

hypothesis: Anna Paquin acted in a romantic drama film.
premise: + Anna Paquin + As a child , she beat 5000 candidates for the role of Flora McGrath in Jane Campion 's romantic drama film The Piano ( 1993 ) , despite having had little to no acting experience prior to getting the role . + Anna Paquin + Paquin went on to become a successful child actress , receiving multiple Young Artist Award nominations for her roles in Fly Away Home ( 1996 ) , The Member of the Wedding ( 1997 ) , and A Walk on the Moon ( 1999 ) , and was nominated for a Screen Actors Guild Award for Outstanding Performance by a Cast in a Motion Picture for appearing in Cameron Crowe 's comedy-drama film Almost Famous ( 2000 ) . + Romance film + Romance films or romance movies are romantic love stories recorded in visual media for broadcast in theaters and on TV that focus on passion , emotion , and the affectionate romantic involvement of the main characters and the journey that their genuinely strong , true and pure romantic love takes them through dating , courtship or marriage .
explanation_1: Anna Paquin acted in The Piano ( 1993 ) , a romance film.

hypothesis: Natalie Portman has only directed television.
premise: + A Tale of Love and Darkness (film) + A Tale of Love and Darkness is a 2015 drama film directed by Natalie Portman , based on the autobiographical novel of the same name by Israeli author Amos Oz . + Thor (film) + The film was directed by Kenneth Branagh , written by Ashley Edward Miller & Zack Stentz and Don Payne , and stars Chris Hemsworth , Natalie Portman , Tom Hiddleston , Stellan Skarsgård , Colm Feore , Ray Stevenson , Idris Elba , Kat Dennings , Rene Russo and Anthony Hopkins . + Closer (2004 film) + The movie was produced and directed by Mike Nichols and stars Julia Roberts , Jude Law , Natalie Portman and Clive Owen . + The Other Boleyn Girl (2008 film) + The Other Boleyn Girl is a 2008 historical drama film directed by Justin Chadwick . + Natalie Portman + Her first feature film as a director , A Tale of Love and Darkness , was released in 2015 .
explanation_1: Natalie Portman has directed a feature film, A Tale of Love and Darkness, and has directed television.
